column2: The late nights, the way my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] has stopped touching me - or even looking at me - and now the whispers of [cheating_spouse.GetObjectPronoun] and that [adulterer.GetEventTarget1Insult] [adulterer.GetBestName]... I can't take it anymore!

My [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] has stopped touching me, or even looking at me. There is something not right about the way [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] and [cheating_spouse.GetPossPronoun] [adulterer.GetEventTarget1Relation] [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] hold hands, about their long walks in the forest... It sickens me.

One of the servant boys I had shadowing [target_spy_on.GetFirstName] stutters his words as he reports, whitefaced, what he saw my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] doing with [adulterer.GetTitledName] in one of the guest rooms! The boy was hiding behind a tapestry the whole time...

I received a message today, from [From.GetTitledName]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] tells me that [From.GetPossPronoun] suspects that her spouse, [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] are having an affair, but that there is nothing more [From.GetSubjectPronoun] dares do about it!

My [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] just asked me if I'm having an affair with [adulterer.GetTitledName]. [accuser.GetPossPronounCap] stony expression does not reveal whether [accuser.GetSubjectPronoun] knows or is only guessing...

My lover, [cheating_spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] just broke up with me! Apparently, [cheating_spouse.GetPossPronoun] jealous [accuser.GetEventTarget1Relation] confronted [cheating_spouse.GetObjectPronoun] about our affair...

My [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] tearfully admitted to [cheating_spouse.GetPossPronoun] affair with [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and is begging me for forgiveness on [cheating_spouse.GetPossPronoun] bare knees...
The jealous [accuser.GetEventTarget1Relation] of my lover [cheating_spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has denounced us both as adulterers publicly!

The [accuser.GetEventTarget1Insult] [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] would not accept my sincere apology, but has chosen to denounce both me and [accuser.GetPossPronoun] [cheating_spouse.GetEventTarget2Relation] [cheating_spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] publicly as adulterers!

[accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] hired spies to observe me and [accuser.GetPossPronoun] [cheating_spouse.GetEventTarget2Relation] [cheating_spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]. They uncovered our love affair, and the [GetRootFromInsult] has chosen to expose our adultery to the public!

My wrathful [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] would not accept my sincere apologies no matter what I said. [accuser.GetSubjectPronounCap] has denounced me and my lover [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] publicly.

My spiteful [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] did not take my frank declaration of love for my [adulterer.GetRootRelation] [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] well at all. The [accuser.GetEventTarget1Insult] has denounced us both publicly.
My cheating [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] - the [accuser.GetEventTarget1Insult] - just smirked and openly admitted to having an affair with [adulterer.GetTitledName]!

[cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] got angry when I confronted her about her rumored affair with [adulterer.GetTitledName], saying she lives in a prison and that I am denying her even the most basic freedoms.
[cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] got angry when I confronted him about his rumored affair with [adulterer.GetTitledName], saying I have grown cold and distant and only greet him with mistrust.
[adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] acts shocked and denies having an affair with my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName].

When questioned about [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] affair with my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName], [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] flew into a rage and physically assaulted me!
What a lovely evening! Good food, good entertainment and the company of friends. But... I don't feel so good. I can't breathe. I CAN'T BREATHE!
What a lovely evening! Good food, good entertainment and the company of friends. But... I don't feel so good. Have I been poisoned?
The filthy [adulterer.GetAdultererAdulteress], [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], did not eat the poisoned shellfish, though I hear some kitchen boy died later that night.
I watched from the gallery as the dirty [adulterer.GetAdultererAdulteress], [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], lay choking to death, servants milling about trying to help. In vain, of course...
The filthy [adulterer.GetAdultererAdulteress], [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], did not die of the poison, but at least [adulterer.GetSubjectPronoun] got ill.

My lover, [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], just broke up with me! Apparently, [adulterer.GetSubjectPronoun] was confronted by my suspicious [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] and promised to stay away.

Challenged to a duel by my furious [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName], my lover, [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], decided to admit [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] guilt and break up with me!

The [adulterer.GetEventTarget1Insult] [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] admits to having an affair with my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName], sincerely asking for forgiveness and promising to stay away from my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation].
In spite of my lover's abasement and apologies, my wrathful [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] has chosen to shame me and [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] publicly as adulterers!
My [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] vehemently denies having an affair with [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and promises to spend more time with me.

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] thanks me for making [From.GetObjectPronoun] aware of our spouses' possible cheating, and for my discretion. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] promises to look into the matter...

My spies have carefully observed my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] and [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], and as far as they can determine, they are not having an affair.

My spies report that they caught my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] and [cheating_spouse.GetPossPronoun] lover, [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] 'in flagrante delicto' in a glade near [adulterer.Location.Capital.GetName]!

My suspicious [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] did not believe my denials and hired spies to uncover my love affair with [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]. [accuser.GetSubjectPronounCap] has denounced us both publicly!

The furious [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] does not accept my profuse denials and has challenged me to a duel to determine my guilt and that of [accuser.GetPossPronoun] [cheating_spouse.GetEventTarget1Relation], my lover, [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]!
[accuser.GetBestName], the [accuser.GetEventTarget1Relation] of my lover [cheating_spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], shocked me by asking me to my face if we're having an affair!
[accuser.GetBestName], the [accuser.GetEventTarget1Relation] of my lover [cheating_spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has sent me a letter asking me directly if we're having an affair!
The cowardly [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] refuses to fight me!

After a few probing exchanges, I realized that [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was no master of the blade. I defeated [adulterer.GetObjectPronoun] easily, proving [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] guilt, and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName]...

[adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] proved to be a formidable opponent. Though I won in the end, I lost three fingers and took several wounds in the process. I have proven [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] guilt, and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName]!

The duel with [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was hard fought, but in the end I proved the better [Root.GetManWoman]. Though [adulterer.GetSubjectPronoun] managed to cut me, I have proven [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] guilt, and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName].
My brutish [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] defeated my beloved [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] in a duel, thus proving our guilt.

My monster of a [accuser.GetRootRelation], the [GetRootFromInsult] [accuser.GetFirstName], slew my beloved [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] in a duel, proving our guilt. I, at least, will have to live with the shame.
My vicious [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] defeated and maimed my beloved [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] in a duel, thus proving our guilt.
My brutish [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] defeated and wounded my beloved [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] in a duel, thus proving our guilt.
Though I fought hard, the vengeful [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated me in a fair duel, thus proving me and my lover [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] guilty of adultery. We are shamed.
I fought [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] hard for what seemed like hours, but just when I finally saw an opening, [accuser.GetSubjectPronoun] pierced my heart. Darkness descends.

The vengeful [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] took my hand off in the vicious duel, thus proving me and my lover [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] guilty of adultery. Maimed and bleeding from many lesser cuts, I will have to accept our humiliation.

The vengeful [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated me in a fair duel. I had to yield after being pierced in the shoulder, thus proving me and my lover [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName] guilty of adultery. We are shamed.

After a few probing exchanges, I realized that [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was no master of the blade. I defeated [accuser.GetObjectPronoun] easily, proving my innocence and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName].

[accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] proved to be a formidable opponent. Though I won in the end, I lost three fingers and took several wounds in the process. I have proven my innocence and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName]!

The duel with [accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was hard fought, but in the end I proved the better [Root.GetManWoman]. Though [accuser.GetSubjectPronoun] managed to cut me, I have proven my innocence and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName].
My valiant [adulterer.GetRootRelation] [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated my brutish [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] in a duel, thus proving our innocence.
My [adulterer.GetRootRelation] [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defended our honor by slaying my [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] in a duel. Our innocence has been proven.

My [adulterer.GetRootRelation] [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated my [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] in a duel, cutting off his hand in the process. Our innocence has been proven.
My valiant [adulterer.GetRootRelation] [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated and wounded my brutish [accuser.GetRootRelation] [accuser.GetFirstName] in a duel, thus proving our innocence.

I fought hard, full of righteous fury, yet [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] disarmed and defeated me in a fair duel, thus proving [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] innocence, and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName].
I fought [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] hard for what seemed like hours, but when my righteous fury gave way to exhaustion, [adulterer.GetSubjectPronoun] pierced my heart. Darkness descends.

[adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] cut me again and again, but I refused to yield. Suddenly, sun blinding me from the glare in [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] blade, [adulterer.GetSubjectPronoun] chopped my hand right off! [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has proven [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] innocence, and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName].

I fought hard, full of righteous fury, yet [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] cut me again and again. Bleeding profusely, I had to yield. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has proven [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] innocence, and that of my [cheating_spouse.GetRootRelation] [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName].
I woke up this morning and realized that I have lost my feelings for my [target_lover.GetRootRelation] [target_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].

My [affair_ender.GetRootRelation] [affair_ender.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has avoided me for some time now, and the rare occasions when we meet have turned from the nights of passion I remember to evenings of arguments and disagreement. It did not come as a shock when [affair_ender.GetSubjectPronoun] told me [affair_ender.GetSubjectPronoun] no longer loves me, but it hurt more than I thought it would.

I let [target_lover.GetFirstName] know of my lost feelings for [target_lover.GetObjectPronoun], and then [target_lover.GetSubjectPronoun] goes and fills my room with flowers... and by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], what is [target_lover.GetSubjectPronoun] wearing?!
I filled [affair_ender.GetFirstName]'s room with roses and waited on [affair_ender.GetPossPronoun] bed wearing... very little. [affair_ender.GetSubjectPronounCap] was most impressed.

I filled [affair_ender.GetFirstName]'s room with roses and waited on [affair_ender.GetPossPronoun] bed wearing... very little. [affair_ender.GetSubjectPronounCap] just sighed and went to sleep in another bedroom.
Having many lovers is exciting and fulfilling. So much love, so much desire... but so little time! I feel like I'm burning the candle at both ends.

My beloved [my_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is suffering from [my_lover.GetPossPronoun] bad marriage with [my_lover.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps I should suggest a romantic retreat to the countryside, just the two of us (and our most trusted retainers)?

Ripped pillows, broken furniture, shattered vases... My marriage to [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has devolved into an unending torment of bitter arguments and fiery rows. I would be depressed, but my lover, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], just suggested that we retire to the countryside for a few days of carefree romance and passion!

[From.GetFirstName] convinced me to stay in [From.Capital.Capital.GetName] so that we could be together right under [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s nose. We even made love in [From.Spouse.GetPossPronoun] bed!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and I spent a few days of romance and passion in a country house far away from the prying eyes of [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] declined my suggestion that we spend some time together alone in a country house, for fear of upsetting [From.GetPossPronoun] [From.Spouse.GetHusbandWife].
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] declined my suggestion that we spend some time together alone in a country house, mumbling about a Watcher with 'cruel eyes' who sees all...
Confront [cheating_spouse.GetFirstName]!
Tearfully confess and ask forgiveness
That meddling witch!
That accursed blackguard!
Very well, but I am deeply disappointed.
I can't afford a scandal right now...
It's a man's world. I'll just have to swallow my pride.
Oh. Ok then.
Such fury must mean innocence... right?
[accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], I curse you with my dying breath!
Poison or bad shellfish?
May [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] curse [adulterer.GetObjectPronoun]!
I hope my [cheating_spouse.GetHusbandWife] gets the hint!
I need to have a serious talk with that apothecary
How will I live without [adulterer.GetFirstName]?
Very well, I can be the greater [Root.GetManWoman].
That's a relief, but I still have doubts...
I hope that's all there is to it!
No! But... I don't want a scandal.
Challenge accepted!
Flatly deny
A smear on [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] honor!
I allowed [adulterer.GetObjectPronoun] to yield unscathed, having lost [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] sword
We must atone for our sins...
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has judged us fairly. We must atone.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] favors our love!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has judged them fairly. [adulterer.GetFirstName] forgive me.
Such is life. I should tell [target_lover.GetObjectPronoun].
I love [target_lover.GetObjectPronoun]! Or is it lust? Who cares!
I've still got it!
Have I lost it?
I can make this work!
I yearn for [my_lover.GetPossPronoun] embrace!
What a splendid idea!
We are so naughty...
I am so happy! Exhausted too...
Such a wasted opportunity!
My poor love, I fear [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is losing it!
Aagh! Not the Watcher! I must hide...
Confront the harlot, [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]!
Confront [adulterer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]!
Admit it, but refuse to break up with [adulterer.GetFirstName]
Never! Denounce them both publicly!
Denounce them both publicly!
I don't need proof when I have poison!
[adulterer.GetFirstName] is married too. Ask [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] spouse [adulterer.Spouse.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to investigate.
Filth! Denounce them both publicly!
A duel? What farce, what mummery!
Confess and promise to end the affair
[adulterer.GetSubjectPronounCap] yielded after I pierced [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] shoulder
How cruel is the world!?
Curse [accuser.GetObjectPronoun]! I will have my revenge!
May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive us!
We are [Root.GetEventTarget1Relation] and [target_lover.GetRootRelation]. What need for love?
Sorry dear, it just doesn't do it for me.
Break up with [first_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
No. What if [my_lover.Spouse.GetFirstName] were to find out?
No... let's be together right here under [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s nose!
Focus on more important matters
Women lovers? Let them play...
Lie to [accuser.GetPossPronoun] face
Our blades will decide [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] guilt!
Pay to have them both watched
I am no fighter. Beg forgiveness.
I will kill the bitch!
The [accuser.GetEventTarget1Insult]! I will kill him!
Bleeding from several cuts, [adulterer.GetSubjectPronoun] yielded only when I took [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] hand off!
[cheating_spouse.GetFirstName], I have shamed you...
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] judge me fairly!
I will rekindle our love!
Time to re-seduce [affair_ender.GetObjectPronoun]!
Break up with [second_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
I wish... but we can't risk it.
Lie and make [accuser.GetObjectPronoun] feel guilty for asking!
I pierced [adulterer.GetPossPronoun] heart. A suitable end to the [adulterer.GetEventTarget1Insult]!
Break up with [third_lover.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
We can't! The Watcher... he sees all!
My affair with [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is ended
[This.GetFirstName] is upset
[This.GetFirstName] is upset and might overreact...
[This.GetFirstName] is manipulated
[accuser.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is attacked and hopefully hurt badly!
Poison [This.GetFirstName] at the first opportunity.
[This.GetFirstName] responds to my lies...
[This.GetFirstName] is tipped off.
[This.GetFirstName] is challenged to a duel.
[This.GetSheHeCap] is given a night [This.GetSubjectPronoun] won't soon forget!
[This.GetFirstName] remains my lover!
The suggestion is made. [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] gets to decide...
We risk discovery by [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
There is almost no risk of discovery by [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
